citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care.
citations.narrative:
A hog undergoing a procedure was pre-medicated with expired xylazine. The staff responsible for the administration of
medications confirmed that the expired medications were used. The use of expired medications could lead to an
inadequate level of sedation. The facility must ensure adequate pre-procedural care in accordance with current
established veterinary medical procedures.
To be corrected by 12/24/2021
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
End Section

narrative:
2.33(b)(5) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care. 
A hog undergoing a procedure was pre-medicated with expired xylazine. The staff responsible for the administration of 
medications confirmed that the expired medications were used. The use of expired medications could lead to an 
inadequate level of sedation. The facility must ensure adequate pre-procedural care in accordance with current 
established veterinary medical procedures. 
To be corrected by 12/24/2021 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives. 
 
End Section
